author: Matt Bassil
description:
Preview season for Riftbound’s very first set, Origins, is here and we are pumped to give you an exclusive look at some new League of Legends cards. We have a rare champion unit card featuring Vayne to reveal, alongside an uncommon unit and two commons.

Continue reading Exclusive League of Legends Riftbound reveals - Vayne's champion card and more
MORE FROM WARGAMER: The best TCGs, Rarest Pokemon cards, Greatest card games
title: Exclusive League of Legends Riftbound reveals - Vayne's champion card and more

author: Alex Evans
description:
It's definitely not yet time for the new, 10th edition Warhammer 40k Imperial Knights codex. But, to avoid this weekend's new Chaos Knights 'dex causing a nasty power gap between stompies of the loyal and traitorous varieties, Games Workshop has helpfully updated the Imperials' points to match, in a surprise Munitorum Field Manual update. And folks: almost everything is cheaper.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k's Imperial Knights just got cheaper in a pre-codex points refresh
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Warhammer 40k starter sets, Best Warhammer 40k games, All Warhammer 40k factions
title: Warhammer 40k's Imperial Knights just got cheaper in a pre-codex points refresh

author: Matt Bassil
description:
Pokémon Pocket has dropped a trailer and release date for its next set and it stars the beloved Generation I Pokémon Eevee, plus all eight of its Eeveelutions. Eevee Grove will release on June 26, 2025.

Continue reading Forget Prismatic Evolutions, Pokémon Pocket's Eeveelutions set is un-scalpable
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Pokémon cards, Rare Pokémon cards, All Pokémon sets in order
title: Forget Prismatic Evolutions, Pokémon Pocket's Eeveelutions set is un-scalpable

author: Matt Bassil
description:
A serialized Golden Chocobo card from MTG Final Fantasy has sold for $40,000. We knew these would go for a fat wad of cash, and sure enough they’ve proven their status as a collectible well worth slavering over. Collectors Lounge, a UK-based TCG store in Yeovil, Somerset, sold the card on June 17, 2025 via eBay.

Continue reading One of MTG Final Fantasy's serialized Chocobo cards just sold for $40k
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates, How to play MTG
title: One of MTG Final Fantasy's serialized Chocobo cards just sold for $40k

author: Timothy Linward
description:
Each of the four main factions in Star Wars Legion will get a refreshed starter set this year, packed with all the models, cards, and tokens needed for a player to field a 600 point ‘Recon’ starter army - and today we’re delving into the Rebel Alliance pack, with insights from Atomic Mass Games’ (AMG) Creative and Development VP Will Shick, and Game Development Director Will Pagani.

Continue reading Star Wars Legion bosses break down how the new Rebel Alliance starter set plays
MORE FROM WARGAMER: Best Star Wars board games, Star Wars Legion - release dates roadmap, Star Wars Shatterpoint review
title: Star Wars Legion bosses break down how the new Rebel Alliance starter set plays

author: Gab Hernandez
description:
While DnD features many flavors of adventure, the hero’s journey remains a staple of many campaigns. So, why not bash together the dice rolls of DnD with the epic storytelling of ancient Greek mythology? The Scarred Lands 5th Edition RPG Bundle features 15 books inspired by the birthplace of philosophy, at a positively Olympian 88% discount.

Continue reading Get 15 epic books for DnD's Scarred Lands setting, just $1 each
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review, DnD classes guide, DnD races guide
title: Get 15 epic books for DnD's Scarred Lands setting, just $1 each
